content: single_crochet in next 10 sts ch3 shell in ch1 space ch3 turn row 11- shell in ch1 space ch3 skip 2 sts single_crochet in next 6 sts ch3 shell in ch1 space ch3 turn row 12- shell in ch1 space chain 3 sk1 sts single_crochet in next 4 sts chain 3 shell in ch1 space ch3 turn 6 row 13- shell in ch1 space shell in ch1 space this closes the top ch3 turn row14 shell in ch1 space ch1 shell in ch1 space ch3 turn 7 row 15+ *shell in ch1 space ch1 shell in ch1 space ch3 turn * repeat from * to* until you have half the length you want your bookmaker break thread/year and now make and exact copy of what you just made leaving 6-8 tail to connect both parts once you have both parts weave in ends except the long tail to attach pieces together 8 now sew the two pieces together i used a whip stitch 9 10 ©nicole hancock 11
